scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a fantastical creature resembling a large, segmented insect or crustacean with numerous legs, positioned in a grassy, undulating landscape. The creature has a long, pointed head with a single antenna. Its body is covered in a ribbed, segmented carapace, and it has a tail with fin-like structures. The background features rolling hills and sparse trees under a blue sky. The scene is framed by an arched border, typical of manuscript illumination.
